articles.title: French Open: Anisimova through to fourth round
articles.description: American Amanda Anisimova advanced to the fourth round of the French Open on Friday after Czech Karolina Muchova was forced to retire due to an ankle injury she suffered during the match.

articles.title: Bengaluru: NCB busts major drug racket
articles.description: The Narcotics Control Bureau (NCB) has seized 34.89kg of heroin, valued at around Rs 52.5 crore, and apprehended a Nigerian man said to be the kingpin of the drug racket operating from New Delhi along with nine gang members.
